method.name: DE-Training Algorithm

reference.ref: Deng C, Guo M (2006) Tri-training and data editing based semi-supervised clustering algorithm. In: Gelbukh A, Reyes-Garcia C (eds) MICAI 2006: advances in artificial intelligence, vol 4293 of lecture notes in computer science. Springer, Berlin, pp 641â€“651

generalDescription.howWork: An extension of the tri-training algorithm. It is an amending multi-classifier, single learner and single view model.
